Greetings to Bulgarian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Bulgarian President 
   Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Georgi Parvanov, President of Bulgaria, on the occasion of its national day. In the message Kim Yong Nam wished the Bulgarian people progress and prosperity, expressing the belief that the long-standing relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to boost on good terms in the interests of the two peoples in the future, too.
